text: Obsidias is a plane mentioned briefly in the graphic novel Mezlok's Challenge . Mezlok established a link with the red mana of the mountains there, which he used to power his lightning spells. Obsidias had a Infinite Consortium safehouse set up by Baltrice . It was later conquered and compleated by New Phyrexia's Machine Legion . Baltrice Mezlok Taishiar Tezzeret
